blogPost.excerpt: Applysis is a data analytics tool, helping businesses owning mobile applications to analyse customer reviews efficiently, in a matter of minutes. With the help of AI we detect concrete problems and most requested features.
blogPost.body: Applysis is a data analytics tool, helping businesses owning mobile applications to analyse customer reviews efficiently, in a matter of minutes. With the help of AI we detect concrete problems and most requested features.
blogPost.title: Applysis - Analyse mobile app reviews efficiently, in minutes.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Applysis是一款数据分析工具，帮助拥有移动应用的企业在几分钟内高效分析客户评价。在人工智能的帮助下，我们会发现具体的问题和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内高效分析移动应用的评论。

localize.description: Applysis是一款數據分析工具，幫助擁有移動應用的企業在幾分鐘內高效分析客戶評價。在人工智能的幫助下，我們會發現具體的問題和最需要的功能。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內高效分析移動應用的評論。

next.excerpt: InstaText is a user-friendly writing and editing tool that helps you improve your text so that you are understood and perceived as a professional. InstaText improves styling and word choice, corrects grammatical errors and enriches your content.
next.title: InstaText - AI-based editing tool that helps you improve your text

localize.description: InstaText是一个用户友好的写作和编辑工具，它可以帮助您改进您的文本，以便您被理解并被视为专业。InstaText可以改善文体和选词，纠正语法错误，丰富您的内容。
localize.tagline: 基于人工智能的编辑工具，帮助你提高文字水平。

localize.description: InstaText是一個用戶友好的寫作和編輯工具，它可以幫助您改進您的文本，以便您被理解並被視爲專業。InstaText可以改善文體和選詞，糾正語法錯誤，豐富您的內容。
localize.tagline: 基於人工智能的編輯工具，幫助你提高文字水平。
